"The Battle of Lake Halphiria":
"The Battle of Lake Halphiria is an Emergency Quest in which you use special weapons to defend Central City against Dark Falz Aegis.

As with all Emergency Quests, this Quest will be announced in advance, and its start location will be displayed on the world map."

"Defeating enemies and destroying parts of Dark Falz Aegis will award Earned Points, which can be spent at Delivery Devices to summon a Mobile Cannon M2.
â€»Earned Points are awarded to all Quest participants equally, and each may spend their own points on deploying Mobile Cannon M2."
